sentence.Network_en: Of or belonging to the Prosimii, a suborder of primates that includes the lemurs lorisesand tarsiers.
sentence.Network_cn: 动物的一个目,包含狐猴眼镜猴猴子猿及人类.

means.word_mean: 1. not used in all classifications; in some classifications considered coextensive with the Lemuroidea; in others includes both Lemuroidea and Tarsioidea
